text.div:
NehtaPeritoneumInvasion

Any involvement of the peritoneum should be recorded.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/nehta-crc-peritoneum-invasion defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
tumour_invades_to_peritoneal_surface Tumour invades to the peritoneal surfaceTumour invades to the peritoneal surface
tumour_formed_nodule(s)_discrete_from_tumour_mass_along_the_serosal_surface Tumour has formed nodule(s) discrete from the tumour mass along the serosal surfaceTumour has formed nodule(s) discrete from the tumour mass along the serosal surface

name: NehtaPeritoneumInvasion
description: Any involvement of the peritoneum should be recorded.

concept.display: Tumour invades to the peritoneal surface
concept.definition: Tumour invades to the peritoneal surface

concept.display: Tumour has formed nodule(s) discrete from the tumour mass along the serosal surface
concept.definition: Tumour has formed nodule(s) discrete from the tumour mass along the serosal surface
